body:
Yes, I'm sure there has been a ton of posts about this but this is hopefully if I can get enough support from the staff/players the official one.

One of mine actually was in a BTS video, the movie being the original hunger games

It was something about literally being out of character a second before the action button:

Jennifer: "Let me tell you this really funny fart joke when this is over"
Some random action man: "ACTION!"
Jennifer: "OH MY GOD! :("

title: Favourite Movie Quotes [Revamped]

replies.body:
Well mine isn't from a movie, its from a TV show, but still my favourite quote:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LF0wa0W13yw

"You don't fight with honor"

"No, he did"

replies.body:
We used to look up at the sky and wonder at our place in the stars. Now we look down and just worry about our place in the dirt. 

- Interstellar (it's also on my profile lmao)
